name: Extra Laser
description:
Made for The Very First Extra Credits Game Design Jam!

If one laser turret is not enough, get extra laser!

Plough your way through endless wave of enemies.

Collect parts to upgrade your ship, consider parts placement quickly!

Touch / Mouse / WASD control

post-jam updates on the way

also available at http://dickson.md/lab/extra-laser
